name: Goldov Party Pack Original
description:
Looking for a fun co-op game?

You found this game!

A fun co-op game for 2-8 players!

3 games in ONE pack. Each game can be played by 2-8 players(we recommend playing at least 3 players). Games in the pack:

  • A fun "horror" game Freakbusters in which one player plays as a ghost and must kill everyone and the rest must install all the generators.
  • 2D game Save Your Balls in which one player can put random objects to help the other players reach the finish line.
  •  A game Deadly Question in which you have to answer the questions of one of the players otherwise you will die(this mode(game) is in beta testing and therefore it may not work correctly).
